userReplicas.name: userReplicas
userReplicas.commands: cd /home/panda/microservices-demo/deploy/kubernetes;minikube stop;minikube delete;minikube start --cpus=4 --memory=8192;kubectl apply -f complete-demo.yaml;sleep 360;nohup kubectl port-forward svc/front-end -n sock-shop --address 0.0.0.0 8080:80 &
